channel.title: Winterlove Client IP
channel.description: I need help changing the IP for connecting the Winterlove client. I tried finding it in the Client folders and I couldn't find it. Please help. This is a 2006 version and does not have the manual option of setting it through buttons like most customary private servers. It must be done through file.

item.title: Winterlove Client IP
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Search for 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 in your client files.

Read full topic
